title: Ketu Transit in the 10th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Ketu transits the 10th house for Scorpio Ascendant, detachment influences career ambition, authority, and public image. The urge for status, recognition, or control weakens, pushing focus toward meaningful contribution over visibility. Career direction may feel unclear, and motivation can fluctuate if driven only by external rewards. Leadership roles require inner clarity rather than dominance. When embraced consciously, this transit builds integrity, purpose-driven work, and a reputation rooted in quiet competence rather than display.

sections.title: Career
points: Low attraction to fame or power

sections.title: Relationships
points: Public roles affect personal bonds less

closing: This Ketu transit removes attachment to status and image. With awareness, it establishes purposeful work, integrity, and quietly respected authority.
